snippet.title: Mighty Fight Federation - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available Now in Steam Early Access! 
Guest Characters Yooka-Laylee and Toejam & Earl Coming Soon!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1096690/Mighty_Fight_Federation/

www.FightMighty.com

Mighty Fight Federation is a competitive 3D Arena Fighter for up to 4 players, bridging chaotic mayhem with the depth and fundamentals of a traditional fighter. 

Launch Features Include:

-11 Playable Characters and 14 Stages
-Soundtrack by Vince DiCola (Transformers, Rocky IV), Manami Matsumae (Mega Man, Shovel Knight), Tee Lopes (Sonic Mania, Monster Boy) and James Landino (RWBY, No Straight Roads)

-Local Vs and Team Vs modes
-Training Mode and Basic Tutorials
-In-Game Character Move Lists
-Remappable Controls and Support for a wide variety of Controllers and Arcade Sticks

-Arcade Mode (Cutscenes and Minigames will be added shortly after launch)
-Online Quickplay and Lobbies

Join the Community Discord for the latest information!

https://discord.gg/NPMmn5T
